short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle show/hide password fields on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you've ever been in a situation where you want to see what you type in the password field but the website didn't have that feature, this is the extension to install.
